Description.Text:
General Description 4 star accommodations A shoppers' paradise. Designed to meet families needs Great combination for business and pleasure
Location Conveniently located in Shopping Center
Local Attractions Family friendly attractions such as Tysons Galleria Mall Close to local attractions such as Downtown Washington D.C.
Recreation Indoor swimming pool State of the art fitness center
Restaurants & Lounges Coffee Shop on property Onsite restaurant Onsite cocktail bar
Services Room service Concierge services Multilingual staff Currency exchange
Meeting Facilities Multiple conference/meeting rooms Wedding venue available Banquet facilities Fully equipped business center
Accommodations Coffee/tea maker Cable/satellite channels Safety deposit box Air conditioning
